Headline: Purple and Yellow Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Purple and Yellow Line trains are experiencing delays due to signal problems near the area of Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple and Yellow Line trains are experiencing delays due to signal problems near the area of Howard.

As a result of the delay:

  • Purple Line trains will be boarded/exited on track #1
  • Yellow Line trains will be boarded/exited on track #2

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
